title: Відморожений
overview: The Dzidzyuki family finally decided to sell their old house in Vyshneve and move to live in the capital. Unfortunately, their cherished dream breaks down into ice like Titanic. In their own cellar, they accidentally find a frozen Misha, their relative, who disappeared 23 years ago in an old refrigerator. Michael Dzidzyuk, played by Dzidzio, is a fun adventurer from the 90's. In the past the hero became a participant in a scientific experiment and "froze" in the cryo chamber for two decades. Now the life of the family will change forever, as the Dzidzyuki are forced to live with the "frostbitten" relative, who by all documents is the owner of the same house for sale.
